message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product which I believe holds significant value for you.  Given its potential, I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,100,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was already quite competitive.  To move this forward, I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,025,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
